name: Hiraeth (nine)
description:
This game uses colors to tell the story and express the mental state of what it means to feel

alienated from this world. The game represents mental struggle and how hard the healing process could be. 

How monotonous everyday life feels when you have no interest in it. We see how the player doesn’t find anything interesting in life. They see everything as boring gray. To them everything is unsatisfying. 

 We go on a series of quests to color his life and help him see life from a different perspective.
